016package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.controller;
017
018import android.content.Intent;
019import android.os.Bundle;
020import android.view.Menu;
021import android.view.MenuItem;
022import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
023import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
024import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
025import androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment;
026import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount;
027import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
028import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.NavigationGraphDirections;
029import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.R;
030import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
031import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.PermissionsViewModel;
032import java.util.HashSet;
033import java.util.Set;
034
035/**
036 * Serves as a basic container activity&mdash;that is, it presents no UI elements of its own (apart
037 * from an options menu), but hosts a {@link androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment} for
038 * presentation of one or more {@link androidx.fragment.app.Fragment} instances, associated with a
039 * navigation graph.
040 * <p>In addition to the navigation host role, this activity demonstrates the
041 * handling of:</p>
042 * <ul><li><p>user sign-out (initiated by selection of an options menu item), with automatic
043 * navigation back to {@link LoginActivity} on completion of the sign-out;</p></li>
044 * <li><p>user-initiated navigation to {@link SettingsActivity};</p></li>
045 * <li><p>updates of UI {@link android.view.View} widget properties based on preference values
046 * (obtained from {@link edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.PreferencesViewModel});</p></li>
047 * <li><p>key events in the permissions request flow.</p></li></ul>
048 */
049@AndroidEntryPoint
050public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity implements
051    PermissionsExplanationFragment.OnAcknowledgeListener {
052
053  private static final int PERMISSIONS_REQUEST_CODE = 128158634;
054
055  private LoginViewModel loginViewModel;
056  private PermissionsViewModel permissionsViewModel;
057
058  @Override
059  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
060    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
061    setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);
062    setupViewModels();
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu) {
067    super.onCreateOptionsMenu(menu);
068    getMenuInflater().inflate(R.menu.main_options, menu);
069    return true;
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(@NonNull MenuItem item) {
074    boolean handled = true;
075    int itemId = item.getItemId();
076    if (itemId == R.id.settings) {
077      Intent intent = new Intent(this, SettingsActivity.class);
078      startActivity(intent);
079    } else if (itemId == R.id.sign_out) {
080      loginViewModel.signOut();
081    } else {
082      handled = super.onOptionsItemSelected(item);
083    }
084    return handled;
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode, @NonNull String[] permissions,
089      @NonNull int[] grantResults) {
090    if (requestCode == PERMISSIONS_REQUEST_CODE) {
091      permissionsViewModel.handlePermissionsRequestResult(permissions, grantResults);
092    } else {
093      super.onRequestPermissionsResult(requestCode, permissions, grantResults);
094    }
095  }
096
097  @Override
098  public void onAcknowledge(String[] permissions) {
099    requestPermissions(permissions, PERMISSIONS_REQUEST_CODE);
100  }
101
102  private void setupViewModels() {
103    loginViewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this).get(LoginViewModel.class);
104    loginViewModel
105        .getAccount()
106        .observe(this, this::handleAccount);
107    permissionsViewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this).get(PermissionsViewModel.class);
108    Set<String> permissionsToRequest = new HashSet<>();
109    Set<String> permissionsToExplain = new HashSet<>();
110    permissionsViewModel.checkPermissions(this, permissionsToRequest, permissionsToExplain);
111    if (!permissionsToExplain.isEmpty()) {
112      //noinspection DataFlowIssue
113      ((NavHostFragment) getSupportFragmentManager()
114          .findFragmentById(R.id.nav_host_fragment))
115          .getNavController()
116          .navigate(NavigationGraphDirections.explainPermissions(
117              permissionsToExplain.toArray(new String[0]),
118              permissionsToRequest.toArray(new String[0])));
119    } else if (!permissionsToRequest.isEmpty()) {
120      requestPermissions(permissionsToRequest.toArray(new String[0]), PERMISSIONS_REQUEST_CODE);
121    }
122  }
123
124  private void handleAccount(GoogleSignInAccount account) {
125    if (account == null) {
126      Intent intent = new Intent(this, LoginActivity.class)
127          .addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK | Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
128      startActivity(intent);
129    }
130  }
131
132}
